entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
PATCHY SMOKE THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
